ygData.subject: Re: another topic
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, there s not much else they re working on, other than stress-testing and zone population, that was in the letter I got when I was accepted into the
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, there's not much else they're working on, other than
stress-testing and zone population, that was in the letter I got when I was
accepted into the 2nd phase of the beta. They're just doing minor tweaking
here and there to fix bugs and make sure balance is right (something EQ
should have paid more attention to in beta perhaps?), but they've said they
don't have very much left to do. I will for one say that when I tried it, I
played for maybe about 3 hours total before I got totally disgusted with the
clunky interface, not to mention I'm not a great fan of that style of
gameplay. *shrug* Just figured I'd throw out what MS/Turbine has said (and
some of my opinions ^_^ ).

Mike
Lohre Soulsaver
Bristlebane Server

----- Original Message -----
From: John Erik Maynus <jmaynus@...>

Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] another topic

>
> **************************

> Lvl 18 Human Cleric of the Rathe
